sent.orig: Without the presence of a functional thalamic connection, Flower concludes that sentience is not possible.
sent.trans: Flower认为，如果不存在功能性丘脑的连接，就不存在感觉。

sent.orig: Bride handing flower head flower, chest flower, shoulder flower, garland and photo frame; luxury ornament art.
sent.trans: 新娘子捧花、头花、胸花、肩花、花环、镜框儿等；高等纪念品。

sent.orig: Bride handing flower head flower, flower, shoulder flower, garland and photo frame; luxury ornament art.
sent.trans: 新娘捧花、头花、胸花、肩花、花环、镜框等；高档纪念品。

sent.orig: There are two kinds of flowers on flower disc, namely ligulate flower and tubular flower.
sent.trans: 花盘上有两种花，即舌状花和管状花。

sent.orig: Clock flower has many variety, have maize clock flower and white clock flower commonly.
sent.trans: 时钟花有多个品种，常见的有黄色时钟花和白色时钟花。
